r.d: This class provides handling of tar files in PHP. It supports creating, listing, extracting and adding to tar files. Gzip support is available if PHP has the zlib extension built-in or loaded. Bz2 compression is also supported with the bz2 extension loaded.
r.n: * Fix Bug #17853: Test failure: dirtraversal.phpt [mrook] * Fix Bug #18512: dead links are not saved in tar file [mrook] * Fix Bug #18702: Unpacks incorrectly on long file names using header prefix [mrook] * Implement Feature #10145: Patch to return a Pear Error Object on failure [mrook] * Implement Feature #17491: Option to preserve permissions [mrook] * Implement Feature #17813: Prevent PHP notice when extracting corrupted archive [mrook]
